name: Ayesha Karim
story: I lost my wallet with my NID and student ID at Dhaka University TSC. Thanks to WhereIsIt, a kind stranger reported it found and I got everything back the same evening. The alert system works amazingly well!

name: Imran Hossain
story: My colleague forgot his laptop at our office cafeteria in Banani. I used WhereIsIt to report it found, and within an hour he contacted me. The secure chat made the handover smooth and safe.

name: Nabila Rahman
story: I dropped my car keys at Hatirjheel during my morning walk. Someone found them and posted on WhereIsIt. The location pin helped us meet quickly. Truly a lifesaver!

name: Sajid Ahmed
story: I left my camera bag in a ride-sharing car in Chattogram. Thanks to WhereIsIt's growing community, the driver found me through the app and returned everything safely. Couldn't be more grateful!

name: Farhana Akter
story: One of my students found my gold ring in the classroom and posted it on WhereIsIt. I had almost given up hope after searching for days. This platform brought back something priceless.

name: Mahmudul Hasan
story: I found an important business file at a café in Gulshan. Using the app, I quickly connected with the owner — who later became one of my business partners. WhereIsIt connects people in unexpected ways.
